text:
e="preserve">Chhetan Gurung (Nepali: छेतन गुरुङ; 5 February 19799 September 2020) was a Nepalese movie director and writer. He was known for his work in Nepali cinema. He has written scripts for Nepali movies including "November Rain" (2014), "Classic" (2016), "A Mero Hajur 3" (2019), and "Prem Geet 3".
Gurung died of liver disease on 9 September 2020 in Kathmandu, Nepal at the age of 41.
